mapper.delete: DELETE st.*, ts.*, tt.* FROM t_sinker_topo st LEFT JOIN t_sinker_topo_schema ts ON st.id = ts.sinker_topo_id LEFT JOIN t_sinker_topo_table tt ON st.id = tt.sinker_topo_id where st.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.sinker_name, t.sinker_conf, t.jar_id, t.status, t.description, t.update_time, j.name jar_name ,j.path jar_path from t_sinker_topo t join t_topology_jar j on t.jar_id = j.id
